text: Adam Smelczyński (14 September 1930 – 14 June 2021)Łódź. Zmarł Adam Smelczyński, olimpijski.pl was a Polish trap shooter. He competed at six Olympics between 1956 and 1976. He won one silver medal in 1956. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Poland Category:Sport shooters
title: Adam Smelczyński
